fullplot: Gulrez "Gullu" Qadir is sick and tired of being rejected by dowry seeking men . She then decides that according to a new law she will marry a man and push him in a dowry case and take the dowry money from him and leave to America to fulfill her dreams. Enter Tariq "Taru" Haider a middle class chef who owns a resteraunt in Lucknow whom she pushes into a dowry case.
plot: After one too many heartbreaks, shop girl Gulrez has no hope of finding a husband, until she meets a spicy chef who might just be to her taste.
title: Daawat-e-Ishq
